announcementContent.description: Welcome to the third semester of NSYSU Course Selector Helper! Thank you for using this system. Your valuable feedback has been received and improvements will be made. Thank you for your support!
notes: This website is designed for desktop experience. **Desktop browsing is recommended**. Mobile improvements are in progress, feel free to provide feedback.
This is an auxiliary system for course selection, **for reference only**.
Course data is crawled static data. If there are **changes** from the school, please **contact us** if not updated. Thank you.
updatesDetails: Auto-select renamed to Course Detective with sorted list
New frontend completed! Mobile version available!
Added Course Detective time-click filter feature
One-click registration merged with selected courses
Automatic course data update every hour
features: More powerful filters and smart search
Local Storage auto-saves selection data when browser closes
Automatic course data update every hour
knownIssues: Safari browser may have rendering issues. Please contact us if you encounter any rendering errors and note your browser version. (If you're willing to be a tester, please mention you want to be an iOS frontend tester in the form, much appreciated)
Bundle initialization loading is slow. Currently considering refactoring with Vite. If you experience any lag, please fill out the feedback form and note the location.
copyright: By NSYSU Open Development Community. MEME113
Copyright © 2025 NSYSU Open Development Community. All rights reserved.

entryNotification.dontShowVersionAgain: Don't show this version notification again

selectedExport.title: Selected Export
selectedExport.importError: Import failed, please check script format
selectedExport.exportDescription: The selected course export feature allows you to configure course priority points and generate auto-fill scripts for use in the course selection system.

helpModal.title: Script Usage Tutorial

step1.title: Select courses to export
step1.description: In the selected course list, check the courses you want to export and set the corresponding selection points.

step2.title: Generate export script
step2.description: Click the "Generate Export Script" button, and the system will automatically generate a JavaScript script.

step3.title: Copy script content
step3.description: Click the "Copy Script" button in the script dialog to copy the script to clipboard.

step4.title: Log in to course selection system
step4.description: Open NSYSU course selection system and log in to your account.

step5.title: Go to course selection page
step5.description: Find and enter the course registration page in the selection system.

step6.title: Open developer tools
step6.description: Press F12 or right-click and select "Inspect" to open browser developer tools.

step7.title: Execute script
step7.description: Paste the script in the Console tab and press Enter to execute. The system will automatically fill in course data.

warnings: Make sure to execute the script on the correct course selection page
It is recommended to test during non-official selection periods
Check the fill-in results after script execution

reset.title: Reset Settings
reset.description: Restore all settings to default values
reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This action cannot be undone.
